description:
Grandpa Meteor retired to his homeland to spend his twilight years, but he was forced to descend to the green grassland when the lambs made a wish together. The lambs and other animals come to hear the news, eagerly waiting for their wishes to be fulfilled. After a busy day, Grandpa Meteor fainted when he realised that there were more and more unfulfilled wishes. So the lambs decided to be their own wish messengers, to fulfil each other`s wishes and to pass on the love ......
source: bgm.tv/deepl

OTHER: 33:喜羊羊与灰太狼之羊羊小心愿

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tailang: Yangyang Xiao Xinyuan
喜羊羊与灰太狼之羊羊小心愿
